Issue.creator: wlahti
Issue.summary: Require orderer file ledger location to be set
Issue.description: The orderer currently allows starting with a configuration that does not specify the Orderer.FileLedger.Location. When this occurs, the orderer uses the Orderer.FileLedger.Prefix and creates a temporary directory using this prefix. In order to handle crash fault tolerance, the orderer needs a configured directory and should not generate a temporary directory. The orderer should panic if a location is not provided.
